title: Manchester teen arrested in connection with early morning shooting
content:
Woman shot suffered serious injuries
MANCHESTER, N.H. —
Manchester police arrested a teenager in connection with an early morning shooting Saturday.
Police say after an investigation, the suspect was identified as Damian Walsh, 18, of Manchester.
According to authorities, a woman was shot at 91 West St. just at around 5:40 a.m.
The victim was taken to Catholic Medical Center with serious, but non-life-threatening injuries. Police say the shooting does not appear to be random.
The investigation is still ongoing. Police ask anyone with information to call the Manchester police department.
